info.title: Inspection Manager API
info.description:
This is an Inspection Manager integrated API server. Please, refer to the following description before using it.
***
## API structure
- **Authorization**. All operations are allowed to be executed only by authorized users. Inspection Manager has 2 roles for API management: **Read** and **Full Access**.
Before doing authorization operation, make sure that the appropriate role is assigned in your account in the IM database. After successful authorization you will get an access token, that should be passed as an HTTP header in further operations. The token is valid for 24 hours.

- **Business objects**. The logic of all business objects is described in the appropriate API operations, including common operations, that will be explained in the next section. You can interact with these objects accessing them by their `GUID`s.

- **File management**. Contains common **Upload** and **Download** functions. Also, there is a **Token** function that provides a file access token, that gives you an access to download specified file. The token is valid for 12 hours.
**Download** function is proceeded only through specifying a file access token. All data that contains file references provides their `GUID` fields as references.
***
## Common operations with business objects
- **Get** - returns a detailed information of the object from the database by its `GUID`.

- **Set** - creates or updates information of the object using specified data as input. If the `GUID` value is not specified, then the method creates new object, otherwise it updates the existing one by `GUID`.

- **List** - returns a list of objects by specified filter parameters with a number of **PageSize**. Each list method supports paging, that is set by **PageSize** and **Page** parameters.
Response of a list method comes with the **NextPage** parameter. If its value is not empty, then by specifying it as **Page** parameter in your request, you will get the next page of results.
All filter parameters are optional.
***
## Specific operations
Some of the objects support operations different from common. For example, `Results` and `Dims` support uploading data with multiple rows through **BulkLoad** method, drawing object has **Autoballoon** method, etc.
See more details on how they work in description.

post.summary: Get authorization token
post.description: Returns a token by `Username` and `Password`

post.summary: Upload File to the centralized storage
post.description: Uploads a File, returns its `GUID`

post.summary: Download File from the centralized storage
post.description:
Returns File content as a binary string

### Request parameters



`Token` - File access token. You can get it through `filestorage/token`

post.summary: Get file access token
post.description: Returns a file access token by file `GUID`

post.summary: Get Part detailed information
post.description: Returns Part detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Part in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Part, returns data of an added/updated Part.

**File** - `GUID` of an uploaded File. If you want to create a new Part, this File must be only a *.pdf* or *.tif* drawing, and if you want to update existing one it is being attached as part file.

**Important! If you want to attach a new Drawing to an existing Part, use instead** `parts/attachdrawing`.

**Mandatory fields**

`PartName` 

`PartNumber` 

`PartRevisionLevel`

post.summary: Get a list of Parts by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Parts. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`PartName` - Part Name (optional). Returns all if not specified

`PartNumber` - Part Number (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Revision` - Part Revision (optional). Returns all if not specified

`LastModificationDateFrom` - Part Last Modification Date (from) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`LastModificationDateTo` - Part Last Modification Date (to) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`PartGUIDs` - String with Part `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Attach new Drawing to an existing Part
post.description:
Attaches specified file by its `FileGUID` to an existing Part with specified `PartGUID`. Returns a `GUID` of a new created Drawing object

### Request parameters



`PartGUID` - Part `GUID`

`FileGUID` - *.pdf* or *.tif* drawing file to attach

post.summary: Get a report for a specified Part
post.description:
Returns generated report file `GUID` for specified parameters

### Request parameters



`ReportType` - Acceptable values: **PLAN** - Inpection Plan, **FAI** - Inspection Report, **PPAP** - Multi Piece Report, **PDF** - ballooned drawing as PDF file

`ReportTemplate` - Template name (for example, 'FAIFormB'). Mandatory for Reports **PLAN**, **FAI**, **PPAP**

`SampleGUIDs` - String with Sample `GUID`s separated with commas. Mandatory for Reports **FAI**, **PPAP**

post.summary: Get report templates list
post.description:
Returns report templates list

### Request parameters



`ReportType` - Acceptable values: empty, 'PLAN', 'FAI', 'PPAP'

`ReportTemplate` - Template name (for example, 'FAIFormB')

post.summary: Import Part as .xdf file
post.description: Imports .xdf, returns imported Part `GUID`

post.summary: Get Part as .xdf file
post.description: Generates .xdf for a specified Part, returns file `GUID`

post.summary: Clone Part
post.description:
Clones part with specified parameters, identically to **Save As** function in IM
 
**Mandatory fields**

`PartGUID`

`NewPartNumber`

`NewPartName`

`NewRevision`

post.summary: Get Part QRCode data & links
post.description: Returns IMX/IME related object data and links by Part `GUID`

post.summary: Add new Part from file
post.description: Creates part from file, returns data of created Part. Supports single files (for example *.dis, *.xml) and *.zip archives

post.summary: Update information on the existing Drawing in the database
post.description:
Updates a Drawing, returns data of an updated Drawing
 
**Mandatory fields**

`GUID`

`Title`

`SheetName`

`Revision`

post.summary: Get a list of Drawings of a specified Part
post.description:
Returns a list of Drawings. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`PartGUID` - Specific Part (optional). Returns all if not specified

`DrawingGUIDs` - String with Drawing `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Autoballoon Drawings of a specified Part
post.description:
Processes autoballooning of Drawings of a Part specified by `GUID`. You can specify GUIDs of particular Drawings to autoballoon in the `DrawingGUIDs` parameter, otherwise all the drawings of the specified part will be autoballooned

### Request parameters



`PartGUID` - Part `GUID`

`DrawingGUIDs` - **Not mandatory**. String consisting of GUIDs of particular drawings separated with commas

`DetectSurface` - **Not mandatory**. 0 - No, 1 - Yes

`DetectFlagNotes` - **Not mandatory**. 0 - No, 1 - Yes

`ParsingProfile` - **Not mandatory**. 0 - Default, 1 - Catia

post.summary: Add multiple Dimensions to the database
post.description:
Adds Dimensions to the database, returns a number of added Dimensions

Field `Units` in Dims input must be specified as: **0** - empty, **1** - MM, **2** - INCH, **3** - DEG, **4** - RAD

### Request parameters



`PartGUID` - *mandatory*

`IgnoreInvalidLines` - Specifies if the function should ignore invalid lines or throw an error

### Response parameters



`Count` - Number of added Dimensions

post.summary: Get a list of Dimensions for a specified Part
post.description:
Returns a list of Dimensions. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`PartGUID` - Specific Part (optional). Returns all if not specified

`OperationGUIDs` - String with Operation `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

`DimGUIDs` - String with Dimension `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get designator information of a specified Dim by dim `GUID`
post.description: Returns designator information of a specified Dim by dim `GUID`

post.summary: Get Job detailed information
post.description: Returns Job detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Job in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Job, returns data of an added/updated Job
 
**Mandatory fields**

`PartGUID`

`Number`

`Revision`

`ActivationDate`

`DeliveryDate`

**Input fields**

`AQLMode` - Acceptable values: 0 - Acceptance-based [ANSI Z1.4], 1 - Sampling-based [C=0]

`InspectionLevel` (Acceptance-based) - Acceptable values: 0 - empty, 1 - Level I, 2 - Level II, 3 - Level III, 4 - S-1, 5 - S-2, 6 - S-3, 7 - S-4

`InspectionLevel` (Sampling-based) - Acceptable values: 0 - empty, 1 - Reduced, 2 - Normal, 3 - Tightened, 4 - C1, 5 - C2, 6 - C3, 7 - C4

post.summary: Get a list of Jobs by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Jobs. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`PartGUIDs` - Specific Part (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Number` - Job Number (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Status` - Acceptable values: -1 - All, 0 - 'Planning', 1 - 'Active', 2 - 'Inactive', 3 - 'Complete', 4 - 'Archived' (optional). Returns all if not specified

`JobGUIDs` - String with Job `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

`ActivationDateFrom` - Job Activation Date (from) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`ActivationDateTo` - Job Activation Date (from) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`DeliveryDateFrom` - Job Delivery Date (from) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`DeliveryDateTo` - Job Delivery Date (to) (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Job QRCode data & links
post.description: Returns IMX/IME related object data and links by Job `GUID`

post.summary: Get Lot detailed information
post.description: Returns Lot detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Lot in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Lot, returns data of an added/updated Lot
 
**Mandatory fields**

`JobGUID`

`Number`

`Size`

`StartDate`

`AQLTableGUID`

`InspectionLevel`

**Input fields**

`QualityStage` - Acceptable values: 1 - Production (In-Process), 2 - Final Inspection

`QualityLevel` - Decimal number (0.01, 0.015, ...). In sampling-based mode (C=0) this is 'Default Index Value'

`InspectionLevel` (Acceptance-based) - Acceptable values: 1 - Level I, 2 - Level II, 3 - Level III, 4 - S-1, 5 - S-2, 6 - S-3, 7 - S-4

`InspectionLevel` (Sampling-based) - Acceptable values: 1 - Reduced, 2 - Normal, 3 - Tightened, 4 - C1, 5 - C2, 6 - C3, 7 - C4

post.summary: Get a list of Lots by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Lots. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`Number` - Lot Number (optional). Returns all if not specified

`PartGUID` - Specific Part (optional). Returns all if not specified

`JobGUID` - Specific Job (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Status` - Acceptable values: -1 - All, 0 - 'Planning', 1 - 'Active', 2 - 'Inactive', 3 - 'Complete', 4 - 'Archived' (optional). Returns all if not specified

`AcceptanceStatus` - Acceptable values: empty, 'NONE', 'PASS', 'FAIL', 'N/A' (optional). Returns all if not specified

`StartDateFrom` - Lot Start Date (from) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`StartDateTo` - Lot Start Date (to) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`DueDateFrom` - Lot Due Date (from) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`DueDateTo` - Lot Due Date (to) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`LotGUIDs` - String with Lot `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Lot QRCode data & links
post.description: Returns IMX/IME related object data and links by Lot `GUID`

post.summary: Get Sample detailed information
post.description: Returns Sample detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Sample in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Sample, returns data of an added/updated Sample
 
**Mandatory fields**

`PartGUID`

`LotGUID`

`JobGUID`

`SerialNumber`

### Request parameters



`AddPlaceholders` - Automatically create placeholders for a new sample

post.summary: Get a list of Samples by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Samples. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`PartGUID` - Specific Part (optional). Returns all if not specified

`LotGUID` - Specific Lot (optional). Returns all if not specified

`JobGUID` - Specific Job (optional). Returns all if not specified

`SerialNumber` - Sample Serial Number (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Status` - Acceptable values: -1 - All, 0 - 'In Progress', 1 - 'Complete/OK', 2 - 'Failed/Scrap' (optional). Returns all if not specified

`CreationDateFrom` - Sample Creation Date (from) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`CreationDateTo` - Sample Creation Date (to) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`SampleGUIDs` - String with Sample `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Create new AQL-based Samples in the database
post.description:
Creates AQL-based Samples
 
**Mandatory fields**

`LotGUID`

### Request parameters



`DimsToInspect` - Acceptable values: 0 - empty, 1 - Only 'Finished' Dims from all Operations, 2 - Dims from 'Finished Part' Operation only

post.summary: Get Sample QRCode data & links
post.description: Returns IMX/IME related object data and links by Sample `GUID`

post.summary: Add multiple Measurement Results to the database
post.description:
Adds Measurement Results to the database, returns a number of added Measurement Results

**Input fields**

`Result` - Acceptable values: 0 - empty, 1 - 'PASS', 2 - 'FAIL', 3 - 'N/A', 4 - 'ACCEPT'

`NeedsCalculation` - Set true if you need to calculate result automatically

### Request parameters



`SampleGUID` - Sample `GUID`

`IgnoreInvalidLines` - Specifies if the function should ignore invalid lines or throw an error

post.summary: Get a list of Measurement Results for a specified Sample
post.description:
Returns a list of Measurement Results. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`SampleGUID` - Specific Sample (optional). Returns all if not specified

`JobGUID` - Specific Job (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Status` - Acceptable values: 0 - All, 1 - 'PASS', 2 - 'FAIL', 3 - 'N/A', 4 - 'ACCEPT' (optional). Returns all if not specified

`InspectedDateFrom` - Result Inspected Date (from) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`InspectedDateTo` - Result Inspected Date (to) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`ResultGUIDs` - String with Result `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Measurement Result detailed information
post.description: Returns Measurement Result detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Get a list of failed Measurement Results for a specified Job
post.description: Returns a list of failed Measurement Results. More details on how paging works see in the header

post.summary: Get Gage detailed information
post.description: Returns Gage detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Gage in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Gage, returns data of an added/updated Gage
 
**Mandatory fields**

`GageID`

`Name`

**Input fields**

`Status` - Acceptable values: 0 - empty, 1 - 'Active', 2 - 'Inactive', 3 - 'Not Calibrated', 4 - 'Out for Calibration', 5 - 'Out for Repair', 6 - 'Out of Order', 7 - 'Retired', 8 - 'Missing', 9 - 'Other/Not Avail.'

`TrackingStatus` - Acceptable values: 0 - empty, 1 - 'Checked In', 2 - 'Checked Out', 3 - 'Not Available'

`LastCalibrationResult` - Acceptable values: 0 - empty, 1 - 'Passed', 2 - 'Failed'

`CalibrationInterval` - Acceptable values: 0 - empty, 1 - 'DAYS', 2 - 'MONTHS', 3 - 'YEARS', 5 - 'USAGE BASED'

`Units` - Acceptable values: 0 - empty, 1 - 'Metric (MM)', 2 - 'English (INCH)', 3 - 'DEG', 101 - 'Multi-Unit', 102 - 'Other'

post.summary: Get a list of Gages by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Gages. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`GageID` - Gage ID (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Name` - Gage Title (optional). Returns all if not specified

`NextDueDate` - Gage Next Due Date to search from (optional). Returns all if not specified

`CertExpDate` - Gage Expiration Date to search from (optional). Returns all if not specified

`ExpStatus` - Acceptable values: 0 - All, 1 - 'Expired Soon', 2 - 'Expired'

`Status` - Acceptable values: 0 - All, 1 - 'Active', 2 - 'Inactive', 3 - 'Not Calibrated', 4 - 'Out for Calibration', 5 - 'Out for Repair', 6 - 'Out of Order', 7 - 'Retired', 8 - 'Missing', 9 - 'Other/Not Avail.'

`GageGUIDs` - String with Gage `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Update Gage Check-In/Check-Out status with specified Place
post.description:
Updates Gage Check-In/Check-Out status along with Current Place field

### Request parameters



`CurrentPlaceGUID` - Optional parameter. If not specified, the Current Place field sets equally to Storage Place

post.summary: Update Gage Check-In/Check-Out status with specified Place and User
post.description:
Updates Gage Check-In/Check-Out status along with Current Place and Current User field
 
**Mandatory fields**

`GageGUID`

`CurrentPlaceGUID`

`ContactGUID`

post.summary: Get Gage attachments
post.description: Creates Gage attachments package, returns files list and package file GUID

post.summary: Add attachments to a Gage
post.description:
Adds attachment files by their GUIDs, returns file list

### Request parameters



`Files` - String with File `GUID`s separated with commas

post.summary: Delete Gage attachments
post.description:
Deletes attachment files by their GUIDs, returns file list

### Request parameters



`Files` - String with File `GUID`s separated with commas

post.summary: Get NCR detailed information
post.description: Returns NCR detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing NCR in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates an NCR, returns data of an added/updated NCR
 
**Mandatory fields**

`Number`

post.summary: Get a list of NCRs by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of NCRs. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`JobGUID` - Specific Job (optional). Returns all if not specified

`LotGUID` - Specific Lot (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Status` - Acceptable values: 0 - empty, 1 - 'Open', 2 - 'Closed', 3 - 'Waiting', 4 - 'Repair Required', 5 - 'Repaired', 6 - 'Scraped Part', 7 - 'Accepted As-Is' (optional). Returns all if not specified

`CreationDateFrom` - NCR Creation Date (from) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`CreationDateTo` - NCR Creation Date (to) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`ResponseDateFrom` - NCR Response Date (from) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`ResponseDateTo` - NCR Response Date (to) (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Number` - NCR Number (optional). Returns all if not specified

`SampleGUIDs` - String with Sample `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

`NCRGUIDs` - String with NCR `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Measurement Results for a specified NCR
post.description: Returns a list of Measurement Results with detailed information

post.summary: Get defect codes for a specified NCR
post.description: Returns a list of defect codes with detailed information

post.summary: Get Contact detailed information
post.description: Returns Contact detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Contact in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Contact, returns data of an added/updated Contact
 
**Mandatory fields**

`FirstName`

`LastName`

`CompanyGUID`

post.summary: Get a list of Contacts by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Contacts. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`FirstName` - Contact first name (optional). Returns all if not specified

`LastName` - Contact last name (optional). Returns all if not specified

`ContactGUIDs` - String with Contact `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Inspection Center detailed information
post.description: Returns Inspection Center detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Inspection Center in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates an Inspection Center, returns data of an added/updated Inspection Center
 
**Mandatory fields**

`InspCenterID`

`CompanyGUID`

post.summary: Get a list of Inspection Centers by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Inspection Centers. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`Number` - Inspection Center ID / Num (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Name` - Inspection Center Title (optional). Returns all if not specified

`InspCenterGUIDs` - String with Inspection Center `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Location detailed information
post.description: Returns Location detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Location in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Location, returns data of an added/updated Location
 
**Mandatory fields**

`Name`

`CompanyGUID`

post.summary: Get a list of Locations by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Locations. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`Code` - Location Code (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Name` - Location Name (optional). Returns all if not specified

`LocationGUIDs` - String with Location `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Place detailed information
post.description: Returns Place detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Place in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Place, returns data of an added/updated Place
 
**Mandatory fields**

`Name`

`CompanyGUID`

`LocationGUID`

post.summary: Get a list of Places by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Places. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`Name` - Place Name (optional). Returns all if not specified

`LocationGUID` - Specific Location (optional). Returns all if not specified

`CompanyGUID` - Specific Company (optional). Returns all if not specified

`PlaceGUIDs` - String with Place `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Material detailed information
post.description: Returns Material detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Material in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Material, returns data of an added/updated Material
 
**Mandatory fields**

`PartGUID`

`Name`

post.summary: Get a list of Materials by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Materials. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`PartGUID` - Specific Part (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Code` - Material Code (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Name` - Material Name (optional). Returns all if not specified

`SpecNumber` - Material Spec Number (optional). Returns all if not specified

`CertNumber` - Material Cert Number (optional). Returns all if not specified

`SupplierGUID` - Specific Company (optional). Returns all if not specified

`MaterialGUIDs` - String with Material `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Attach File to an existing Material
post.description: Attaches specified file by its `FileGUID` to an existing Material with specified `MaterialGUID`.

post.summary: Get Work Cell detailed information
post.description: Returns Work Cell detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Work Cell in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Work Cell, returns data of an added/updated Location
 
**Mandatory fields**

`WorkCellID`

post.summary: Get a list of Work Cells by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Work Cells. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`WorkCellID` - Inspection Work Cell ID (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Title` - Inspection Work Cell Title (optional). Returns all if not specified

`WorkCellGUIDs` - String with Work Cell `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Machine detailed information
post.description: Returns Machine detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Machine in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Machine, returns data of an added/updated Machine
 
**Mandatory fields**

`MachineID`

`Title`

post.summary: Get a list of Machines by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Machines. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`MachineID` - Machine ID (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Title` - Machine Title (optional). Returns all if not specified

`WorkCellGUID` - Specific Work Cell (optional). Returns all if not specified

`MachineGUIDs` - String with Machine `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Company detailed information
post.description: Returns Company detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Company in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Company, returns data of an added/updated Company
 
**Mandatory fields**

`AccountType`

`Name`

post.summary: Get a list of Companies by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Companies. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`AccountType` - Acceptable values: 0 - All, 1 - 'Customer', 2 - 'Supplier', 3 - 'Vendor', 5 - 'Inspection' (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Name` - Company Name (optional). Returns all if not specified

`CompanyGUIDs` - String with Company `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get Decimal Table detailed information
post.description: Returns Decimal Table detailed information by its `GUID`. Fields ending with 'I' refer to values from the **English (INCH)** column

post.summary: Add new or update existing Decimal Table in the database
post.description: Adds or updates a Decimal Table, returns data of an added/updated Decimal Table. Fields ending with 'I' refer to values from the **English (INCH)** column

post.summary: Get a list of Decimal Tables by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Decimal Tables. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`Title` - Decimal table Title (optional). Returns all if not specified

`DecimalGUIDs` - String with Decimal Table `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Clone existing Decimal Table
post.description: Creates new Decimal Table, copying all data from specified Decimal Table

post.summary: Assign Decimal Table to specified Part
post.description: Assigns Decimal Table to specified Part

post.summary: Get Procedure detailed information
post.description: Returns Procedure detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Procedure in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates a Procedure, returns data of an added/updated Procedure
 
**Mandatory fields**

`PartGUID`

`Code`

`Title`

post.summary: Get a list of Procedures by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Procedures. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`Code` - Procedure Code (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Title` - Procedure Title (optional). Returns all if not specified

`PartGUID` - Specific Part (optional). Returns all if not specified

`DimGUID` - Specific Dim (optional). Returns all if not specified

`ProcedureGUIDs` - String with Procedure `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Create Procedures from Mfg Operations
post.description: Creates Procedures from Mfg Operations of a Part specified by GUID

post.summary: Delete Procedures from the database
post.description:
Deletes Procedures from the database by specified GUIDs
 
**Mandatory fields**

`ProcedureGUIDs`

### Request parameters



`ProcedureGUIDs` - String with Procedure `GUID`s separated with commas

post.summary: Get a list of Placeholders for specified Samples and Dims
post.description:
Returns a list of Placeholders. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`DimGUIDs` - String with Dim `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

`SampleGUIDs` - String with Sample `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

`PlaceholderGUIDs` - String with Placeholder `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Create Dim placeholders in specified Samples
post.description:
Creates placeholders (if not exist) of specified Dim in specified Samples
 
**Mandatory fields**

`DimGUID`

`SampleGUIDs`

### Request parameters



`SampleGUIDs` - String with Sample `GUID`s separated with commas

post.summary: Delete Dim placeholders in specified Samples
post.description:
Deletes placeholders of specified Dim in specified Samples. If `GUID` is specified, the program will delete Placeholder with this GUID ignoring other parameters
 
**Mandatory fields**

`GUID` (when deleting by GUID, other parameters will be ignored)

`DimGUID` (when deleting by DimGUID and SampleGUIDs, GUID will be ignored)

`SampleGUIDs` (when deleting by DimGUID and SampleGUIDs, GUID will be ignored)

### Request parameters



`SampleGUIDs` - String with Sample `GUID`s separated with commas

post.summary: Get Operation detailed information
post.description: Returns Operation detailed information by its `GUID`

post.summary: Add new or update existing Operation in the database
post.description:
Adds or updates an Operation, returns data of an added/updated Operation
 
**Mandatory fields**

`PartGUID` (when creating new Operation)

`Code`

`Title`

### Request parameters



`CopyOperationGUID` - This operation will be copied. If not specified, an empty Operation will be created

`DimGUIDs` - String with Dim `GUID`s separated with commas, which will be included into new Operation

post.summary: Get a list of Operations by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of Operations. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`PartGUID` - Specific Part (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Code` - Operation Code (optional). Returns all if not specified

`Title` - Operation Code (optional). Returns all if not specified

`WorkCellGUID` - Specific Work Cell (optional). Returns all if not specified

`MachineGUID` - Specific Machine (optional). Returns all if not specified

`OperationGUIDs` - String with Operation `GUID`s separated with commas (optional). Returns all if not specified

post.summary: Get a list of AQL Tables by filter parameters
post.description:
Returns a list of AQL Tables. More details on how paging works see in the header

### Request parameters



`AQLMode` - Acceptable values: -1 - All, 0 - Acceptance-based [ANSI Z1.4], 1 - Sampling-based [C=0]
